name: Round Fight Demo Source Code
description:
Let's make round fight demo like in  Fire Emblem - Blazing Sword from Game Boy Advanced (GBA).  

 


If the HTML5 game engine you are using does not provide a sophisticated animation system, I can make you a plugin that suits your needs for animation configurations.

I can help you make the round fight style game mechanic or animation system for your HTML5 web game.
